DataElement.preferredName: Patient Strong And Moderate Cytochrome P450 Induction Or Inhibition Agent Administration Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The coded response indicating whether a patient meets the eligibility criteria regarding administration of strong and moderate cytochrome P450 system inducers or inhibitors.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Strong And Moderate Cytochrome P450 Induction Or Inhibition Agent Administration Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Having strength, power, or intensity greater than average or expected._An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence._The quality of being within reasonable or average limits; not excessive or extreme._A family of cytochromes that are involved in electron transport and oxidative metabolism of drugs and other bioactive molecules. When the catalytic heme is reduced the absorbance peak for this protein occurs at 450 nm._The act of bringing about something._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._The interference with or prevention of an action or response even though the stimulus for that action or response is present._An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect._The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Strong And Moderate Cytochrome P450 Induction Or Inhibition Agent Administration Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: Having strength, power, or intensity greater than average or expected.:An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.:The quality of being within reasonable or average limits; not excessive or extreme.:A family of cytochromes that are involved in electron transport and oxidative metabolism of drugs and other bioactive molecules. When the catalytic heme is reduced the absorbance peak for this protein occurs at 450 nm.:The act of bringing about something.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:The interference with or prevention of an action or response even though the stimulus for that action or response is present.:An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect.:The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. Concepts.definition: Having strength, power, or intensity greater than average or expected.
An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.
The quality of being within reasonable or average limits; not excessive or extreme.

A family of cytochromes that are involved in electron transport and oxidative metabolism of drugs and other bioactive molecules. When the catalytic heme is reduced the absorbance peak for this protein occurs at 450 nm.
The act of bringing about something.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
The interference with or prevention of an action or response even though the stimulus for that action or response is present.
An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect.
The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator to represent a response of Yes, No, or Not Applicable._The affirmative response to a question or activity._The non-affirmative response to a question._Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Is patient receiving strong a
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient receiving strong and moderate cytochrome P450 system inducers or inhibitors?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient taking any medications affecting CYP-450 metabolism?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient receiving any medications or substances that are strong inhibitors or inducers of CYP3A4 or moderate inhibitors of CYP3A4?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient taken  strong inhibitors and/or inducers of cytochrome P450 (CYP) 3A4, CYP2C19 or CYP2C9 within 1 week preceding the first dose of MLN0128 (TAK-228)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received strong or moderate CYP3A inducers within 3 weeks (5 weeks for enzalutamide or phenobarbital) of starting olaparib?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient receiving any medications or substances that are considered moderate to strong inhibitors or inducers of CYP3A and is not able to switch to an alternative that minimizes interaction potential?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient require concurrent treatment with any medications or substances that are potent inhibitors or inducers of CYP3A4?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient receiving any medications or substances that are moderate or strong inhibitors or inducers of CYP3A4 and P-glycoprotein?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 8
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient receiving any medications or substances that are strong or moderate inhibitors or inducers of CYP3A4 within 14 days prior to study treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 9
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient require any medications or substances that are moderate CYP2C9 inducers and strong CYP3A4 inducers?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 10
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient receiving combined P-gp and strong or moderate CYP3A inducers or BCRP substrates?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 12
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patients receiving any medications or substances that are strong inhibitors or inducers of CYP3A4 or substrates of CYP1A2 with narrow therapeutic windows and strong inhibitors or inducers of CYP3A4 that cannot be discontinued at least 7 days prior to the first dose of ZEN003694?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 11
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient receiving any medications or substances that are strong inhibitors or inducers of CYP3A4 or substrates of CYP1A2 with narrow therapeutic windows?
